title: Quiz: Your First Scrum Master Tasks
description: Test your understanding of processing standup notes, retrospectives, and sprint updates.

questions.question: What is the PRIMARY goal when processing standup notes with Copilot?
options: Generate a transcript for the team
questions.explanation: The primary goal is to synthesize standup notes into actionable insights, focusing on what needs attention and what's blocking progress.

questions.question: When synthesizing retrospective feedback, Copilot can help identify recurring themes across multiple sprints.
questions.explanation: Copilot excels at pattern recognition and can analyze retrospective data across sprints to identify recurring issues and trends.

questions.question: When transforming sprint updates for different audiences, which factor is MOST important to consider?
options: Technical detail level for the audience
questions.correctAnswer: Technical detail level for the audience
questions.explanation: Different audiences (developers, stakeholders, executives) need different levels of technical detail. Tailoring the depth and focus of content is crucial.

questions.question: Which Copilot feature helps maintain context about your team across multiple prompts?
questions.explanation: Copilot Memory allows you to store persistent team context that Copilot can reference across different conversations.
